Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars video game voice actors

nodes.text: Mat Lucas (born October 27, 1977) is an American voice actor who voiced Anakin Skywalker in Star Wars: Clone Wars and a few Star Wars video games. He is considered an "audio double" of Hayden Christensen. He also has done editing and other film-related tasks at AFI. Mat has stated that he hopes to do more voice-overs in the future. Despite this, he would be replaced by Matt Lanter, who voiced the character onward.
